column5: Well thanks for the great ideas on getting sponsor. I took the advice and put it into practice. Took a great pic of my truck and had there decal put ont it on a computor. Printed it out and presented it to all prospective sponsors. Needless to say I have my complete season payed for and gas with motel room to boot. Thank you all for the advise and Merry Xmas and have a Happy New Year jigger Bob Mann
I hope you hit up Mann's bait!
What a great board. Answers for everything and they really work.  Congrats on the new sponsor.   So how do I get my wife to let me go on a week long Fly In Trip next year?
Way to go! I think Crazyhook might have something there with the Mann's idea! LOL
Nemo, I have absolutely no idea how you buy a pass for your fly in trip.  Apparently, you should do something different than what I'm doing.  I think we should get together for a strategy meeting.
Great job!  I remember that original thread...very happy to hear that this great community was able to help out...  Now go and catch some bigguns!!!!

That's impressive, I remember you posted about that only a little while ago.  Glad it worked out, there are some sponsored tournament anglers and guides here who I'm sure would be willing to help out somebody who is just starting.  Mike

Theres more. On my way home today I stopped to pick up some stuff for my wife at our pool place that just put our pool in this summer. The owner seen my new truck with all the sponsor decals. He asked about them. You will never guess what he said. How do I get on your truck. $400. for decal in back window plus $2000 grand per year with a 3 year deal. Befor I left he had given me a disk with what he want on decal and cheque for decal and he would have the othere cheque in the first of the year. Once again thanks for all the help you have given me. I will be fishing the BFL in Michigan. Last year I did it as a co-angler. Loved it going back as a pro in the states in 2007.  You guys are great. If I have any questions I now were to go.  Jigger  Bob Mann  Sorry no relations to Mann's bait. I have sent out portfolio to them.
THats awesome!  But where are the pics?  CHeers!
The truck is in at Decal shop "Doug Smithg Signs" tonight being done. It looks great. As soon as its done I promise to put pics on this site. jigger
Umm Bob... I think your gonna have to start answering OUR questions... lol.. good for you bud!!
